message.body: Echo_Mask is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be The Guy: Secret Santa 2022! [If you made a game for the bundle you can freely request it]

its only 2 screens so it shouldnt take too long

Hi Echo, you are my savior from k3 everywhere
I mean that it feels that everyone is streaming k3 lately and your secret santa streams are like a sanctuary
K3 and CN3 will never die

one is the needle challenge and one is the boss challenge game

If I got this as my gift I'd be crying

different people just have different preferences for difficulty
Nah I get ya. Nothing wrong with it, just not my cup of tea and all for a fun fangame

bro balloons is like 50 times harder than this
actually echo this is the entirety of balloons
we were just very lazy the last 8 years
and the trailer isn't real its CGI

CG = computer graphics, as opposed to a real recording
now I explained the joke, that makes it really funny
it can be rly poorly executed and just take away the immersion of whatever ur watching
cg in anime is usually p damn bad

this is the final boss, theres another attack after it

it was loosely inspired by the original balloons attacks
the one in Cultured 2 is much closer

the inspiration for the attack that gave you so much trouble

well its an entirely different attack

This boss gives me wonderful vibes
nah im pretty sure its by jopagu
but can you stand on the cloud
luckily i can help if the puzzle is too cryptic
the blue fruit is definitely relevant
so when you get the blue cherry to appear, a fake block (upside tile) also appears
when you loop the screen, just go back left instead of walking right to the start again
so now there's an upside down tile near the red cherries
it's completely empty, so you can land there
he had to be helped to see the tile
touching the blue cherry made the other cherries no longer kill you
so you can fall down there
so you want to go back down then back to right
but yeah, i figured you would have hated it without help since hard needle and puzzle kinda don't play nicely together
yoshi moves faster than the kid
